name: Airtopia
0:
”Alexa set the AC to cool”
”Alexa set the AC to 20 degrees”
”Alexa turn off the AC”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill connects Alexa with your Airtopia automation controller to provide voice control of your AC, powered by the Smart Voice automation engine.

Through simple voice commands, you can control your AC to set the temperature and activate the heating or cooling. Some example phrases are;
"Alexa, set the AC to 20 degrees"
"Alexa, set the AC to cool"
"Alexa, turn on the AC"

Notice: To use this Skill you need to have a functional automated home with an Airtopia automation controller with a Smart Voice License and Account, sold separately.

NOTE: This skill may not be suitable for people of all ages
